entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:50 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:50 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
